concept.title: About Removing a Group from the Privilege Set

conbody.p:
As an Administrator, you can remove a group from the privilege set if you no longer need it. The following conditions apply when you remove a group in the Security Management application:
The users associated with the group can no longer access the privilege set.
The groups and the users in the respective Identity Provider applications are not deleted.
The group is not deleted in User Account and Authentication (UAA).
